channel.title: Zabbix on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Zabbix on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Shibboleth Hackthebox writeup
item.author: hussienmisbah11@gmail.com (0xMesbaha)
item.description: In this Box we are going to enumerate a udp port and dump the administrator hash ,then we will crack it , using these credentials we will login to the zabbix web interface , using my exploit for this version of zabbix we will get a low-privilege shell. re-using same password will leverage our access to a user. for the root part we will exploit a vulnerable maria-db version
